column4: OppFi Inc. operates as a specialty finance platform for community banks to extend credit access in the United States. The company offers installment loans through OppLoans platform. It serves consumers who are turned away by mainstream options. The company was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Chicago, Illinois.
